content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello, Haoyu Wang. It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite suitable for your needs. How much were you thinking of offering for the monthly rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I am a student so I'd like to pay as little as possible. I was thinking of paying 300 euros per month. It's a fair price for an unfurnished apartment, isn't it?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 300 euros per month is quite low for an unfurnished apartment in the city center. I'm sure you understand that I need to cover my costs and make a reasonable profit. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understandable, Mister Schmidt. Considering the apartment's location and size, I think 400 euros per month would be more reasonable. It's a good compromise between your costs and my budget.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 400 euros per month is more in line with the market value, but I must confess, I was hoping for a bit more. How about 450 euros per month? This would still be a good deal for you, considering the proximity to all amenities.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate your consideration. However, 450 euros is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay 420 euros per month. I believe it's a fair price for an unfurnished apartment in the city center.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 420 euros per month is closer to what I had in mind. It's a fair offer, considering the apartment's location and amenities. I think we can agree on this price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
I agree to the price of 420 euros [['[']]
[[/[']]
name: Haoyu Wang from China
